title: Pilot: Medium Skin Tone
description: A pilot in uniform, representing aviation, travel, and careers in the sky, with a medium skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's pilot emoji, in a medium skin tone, soars with confidence, featuring a crisp uniform and a classic aviator cap with realistic lighting and subtle reflections. The character on Apple devices is depicted with a determined expression and a slightly forward lean, suggesting adventure and aspiration. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, is perfect for conveying a sense of ambition, travel, or embracing new challenges.
